org.jsapar.parse.text

Class TextLineReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsapar.parse.text.TextLineReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextLineReaderAnyCRLF

    public class TextLineReader
extends Object
implements LineReader
    Internal class for reading lines from a text. LineReader implementation that reads lines from a text Reader object. Reader object should be closed by caller. Once End of File has been reached, the instance will no longer be useful.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextLineReader(String lineSeparator, Reader reader)
      Creates a lineReader instance reading from a reader.

      • readLine

        public String readLine()
                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: LineReader
        Parses one line from the input and returns the result without line separator characters.
        Specified by:
        readLine in interface LineReader
        Returns:
        The next available line from the input without trailing line separator or null if end of input buffer was reached.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case there was an error reading from input.
